item.title: Creating a basic on-prem personal blog
item.description: You’re in the middle of deciding what do you want to do. You go to GitHub, click ’explore’ and see so many open-source projects in so many programming languages. You say to yourself ‘agh, I really want to do stuff like that some day’, so you decide that you’re going to start a side project, right away. All these options, all these programming languages, all this topics, you want to learn everything!
